ACCOUNT_CREATE_EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: Sorry, that email is already in use.  Please try again
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_EMAIL_MESSAGE: Please activate your account by clicking on the link below:
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATE_NOTIFICATION: We have sent you an email with the activation link. Click to get started arguing!
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATE_MESSAGE: We have sent you an email with the activation link.  Click to get started arguing!
ACCOUNT_LOGIN_FAIL: Sorry, your username or password was entered incorrectly.  Please try again.
ACCOUNT_LOGIN_FACEBOOK_FAIL: You didn't allowed us to access your facebook account. Please try again or create an account with us.
ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED: Your account was not yet activated. Please activate your account.
ARGUMENT_FOLLOW_FAIL: 'we encountered issues while making this argument your favorite. Please try again later preferred on next login.'
ARGUMENT_VOTE_FAIL: An error occured while submitting your vote. may be this argument locked / deleted.
ARGUMENT_LOCK_UNLOCK_NOT_ALLOWED_ON_THIS: Please go to detail page to Lock / Unlock this argument
ARGUMENT_LOCKED_PERMINENTLY: Argument Locked. Only you can access this argument at this time.
ARGUMENT_OWNER_AGREE_MESSAGE: Nice try. You are the owner so we already know you agree. But feel free to comment below.
ARGUMENT_OWNER_DISAGREE_MESSAGE: Nice try. You are the owner so we already know you disagree. But feel free to comment below.
ARGUMENT_SPAM_SUCCESS: has been reported as spam. Our administrators are taking a look.
ARGUMENT_UNLOCKED_PERMINENTLY: Argument Unlocked. anyone can access this argument from now.
CONTACT_US_BODY: Have a question or suggestion? Contact Us.  Feel free to post your thoughts publicly as an argument as well :)
CONTACTUS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you for reaching out. We will be in touch with our response shortly
CONTACTUS_ERROR_MESSAGE: Something went wrong while you try to contact us. Please try again.
EMAIL_SENT_MSG_FOR_FORGOT_PASSWORD: An email has been sent that will allow you to reset your password.
INVITE_FROM_ARGUMENT_TO_USERS_SUCCESS: Invitations sent to people you selected. Feel free to share this argument to more people.
INVITE_FROM_ARGUMENT_TO_USERS_FAIL: Fail to send invitations to selected users / you didn't selected any user. Please try again Later.
ISSUES_WHILE_LOCKING_ARGUMENT: we encountered issues while Locking your argument. Please try again later preferred on next login.
NO_COMMENTS_IN_ARGUMENT_DETAIL: There are no comments yet for this argument.  Be the first to agree or disagree with a comment.
NO_FOLLOWERS_AND_FOLLOWING: You don't have any followers and no body following you. Please follow some body to share this argument.
NOT_REGISTERD_USER_MSG_FOR_FORGOT_PASSWO: Sorry, we don't see you (your email address) as a registered user of Disagree.me. Please try again.
NO_VOTES_IN_ARGUMENT_DETAIL: No votes yet for this argument. Be the first to agree or disagree and comment
PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESSFULL: Password reset successful. Now you can log back into Disagree.me
PASSWORD_RESET_FAIL: Unable to reset your password. please try again.
PROFILE_ACCESS_FAIL:
Some thing went wrong while trying access your profile.
Please try again later.
PROFILE_NO_STARTED_ARGUMENTS: No arguments to display. Get started and post your first argument.
PROFILE_UPDATE_VALIDATION_FAIL:
There are some error on the page. Please mind to follow these rules:
Password: should contain 6-32 Alpha Numeric Charecters.
Confirm Password: should match with password.
PROFILE_UPDATE_FAIL:
Some thing went wrong while updating your profile.
Please try again later.
START_ARGUMENT_WITh_FB_HEADING: Start an argument with your Facebook friends
START_ARGUMENT_WITh_TW_HEADING: Start an argument with your Twitter followers
SUGGEST_FEEDBACK_SUCCESS: We got hear from you. We'll be in touch with you soon.
SUGGEST_FEEDBACK_FAILURE: We missed your message, but we logged your message and we'll get back to you soon.
TWITTER_LOAD_FRIENDS_FAIL: 'User Name not found on Twitter. Unable to load Twitter Friends of given usernamefriends'
UNKONOWN_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.
USER_DATA_VALIDATION_FAIL: Server recieved an invalid data. Possibly Some security breach. Please Try again later.
VOTE_ON_LOCKED_ARGUMENT: This argument was locked by the owner. You can only view this argument.
WELCOMEPAGE_TITLE: Disagree.Me is a place where Arguments can be fun.
